title: Gangplank, i miss him already
body:
Whenever i played gangplank, it was always exciting and fun to have passive buffs that i could rally my team to victory, then out of nowhere my ulti could come down and rain on their parade being ap or ad and still make them feel the pain of a badass pirate...but alas it seems those days are long sense gone, the parley is still there and so are the oranges, but the barrels and the new ulti feel so far gone from what i used to play him...and honestly, i feel like  other champs are more deserving of a rework then him any day...but since it seems all changes are final, here are my thoughts on an idea to bring gp up in the world

* silver serpents on a time as well as on q kills, honestly, it feels like i will never get to upgrade his ulti as it would take, at max rank of q, 50 shots of my q, those being kills i might add, at max rank to get a single upgrade, and since it doesnt start immediately on 8 gold per kill, i feel like it takes forever when someone like victor can just go back to shop and buy a new upgrade to his skills with gold he gets from everything he does

*increase fire rate of ulti, or make it random, or cause aoe on the ground as it goes, the ulti feels unatural at best, with the whole field being imploded is one thing but it feels like its not doing enough

*BRING BACK AP {{champion:41}} {{item:3089}}  DAMN IT!!, make the barrels go off ap and ad, make parley do the same, it feels like ap gp will never be viable unless you bring everything to the front at once or you sit back and eat organges all day, whic take a while to come back.....

anyone else want to add anything to it

(and yes, i know in the future there will be buffs to other game modes besides SR, but still, SR needs love too!)
